page.title: 02Housing
page.content: The most common type of house in our survey was a privately owned terraced house but semi detached,link villas and council housing also appeared in significant quantities.The ratio between privately owned and council housing was approximately 60:40. We found that the majority of houses were heated by gas fired central heating although several still had coal fires. Most houses had garages attached and a high proportion had both front and rear gardens. Within the home we found that most people owned a colour t.v.and fridge but less common luxuries were videos ,computers and microwave ovens. We found the average number of people in each home was four.
